review: On May 12, 2015  an email was sent from store_news@amazon.com entitled,"Watch TV Without Bugging Your Partner," stating that ,"Amazon Fire TV and Fire TV Stick are now compatible with Bluetooth headphones." so I happily proceeded to order a Fire TV Stick for a tv in a bedroom ( I already have the Fire TV in the main family room).Well, imagine my surprise when I attempted to pair the bluetooth headphones (which I ordered at the same time as my new Fire TV Stick) and was informed that only bluetooth game controllers not headphones can be paired with the Fire TV Sitck!Thankfully, I am able to use both items in other applications and will not need to return them but I was disappointed that Amazon misinformed me as well as other loyal customers.I phoned customer service, explained the situation and was kindly issued a five (5) dollar promotional credit.FYI -The Fire TV will pair with bluetooth headphones and game controllers.
